home.paragraph_1: Hello! I'm Hans LÃ³pez, a full-stack developer specializing in JavaScript (Node.js).
home.paragraph_2: My experience spans a wide range of applications and projects, from front-end development to creating supervised language models in the field of artificial intelligence. However, my main specialization is in backend development and API creation.

works.title: Fullstack Developer
works.description: I worked on developing an integrating API in the after-sales team for 5 months. The team used Salesforce and focused on creating APIs/Microservices under the Scrum methodology. My main responsibility was to develop the Integrating API and several APIs/Microservices using Node.js and Express. I also worked with technologies like MongoDB, Lightning Web Components, and Salesforce Apex classes.

works.title: Fullstack Developer
works.description: Led the creation of a scalable chatbot system to improve response to student queries. Implemented with artificial intelligence, the system facilitates natural language interaction, optimizing logistics and problem-solving. I used technologies such as NestJS, PostgreSQL, Angular, Django, and TensorFlow for natural language processing.

works.title: Fullstack Developer
works.description: Led a student and activities management project for the Center for Innovation and Technology Transfer. Using the Scrum methodology, I optimized team collaboration and efficiency. I used NestJS and MongoDB for the backend and Vue.js for the frontend.

works.title: Assistant Professor
works.description: For three years, I taught SQL, PL/SQL, Python, and Java. I also provided comprehensive technical advice in these languages and others such as JavaScript.

works.title: Fullstack Developer
works.description: Developed and optimized websites using PHP, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. I focused on enhancing digital security, working in multidisciplinary teams, introducing innovative features, and solving problems to keep websites up-to-date.

works.title: Fullstack Developer
works.description: Developed custom Discord bots with advanced features such as permission systems, music management, user administration, and activity logging, significantly enhancing the community experience.

works.title: Fullstack Developer
works.description: Developed static and dynamic websites using technologies such as Angular, Express, NestJS, Django, and Bootstrap. I also created applications with Django and intuitive interfaces with Bootstrap, ensuring an optimal user experience and attractive design.

text.paragraph_1: ðŸ’» I am a Full Stack developer with solid experience in web and backend application development. I specialize in technologies such as Express, Angular, and MongoDB, and I am a graduate in Programming Analysis and Computer Engineering.
text.paragraph_2: I have advanced skills in modeling both relational and non-relational databases, developing RESTful APIs, and frontend development. I have completed successful projects as a freelancer and provided technical advice as an Assistant Professor at Duoc UC, standing out for my ability to solve complex problems.
